description.text: Coordinated speaker and visiting scholar, arranged whole day event and multiple-track session.

Organized administration team of 8 members to host conference over 1000+ attendee, supervising registration, attendee analytics, and administrative functions by conducting online coordination meetings.
Localized addons.mozilla.org (AMO) and Firefox Sync in Traditional Chinese.
Conducted campus promotion and activities for Firefox 4 and arranged internal affairs-work.
